data.name: How to Install Pikashow App on Firestick?
data.part1:
How to Install Pikashow App on Firestick? 
 Complete steps to install Pikashow on Firestick. 
 Now Go to Amazon App Store and Search Downloader 
 Click the First Downloader App and Download and Install It 
 After Installation, Open it and Give Permission to it asks. 
 Now, Open the FireStick Settings. From the settings 
 Then Choose Developer Options 
 Then Click Install Unknown Apps 
 Find Downloader and Click and Turn it ON (that allows you to install third-party apps) /n hen Open Downloader App from Apps Section in FireTV 
 Then Click the search URL bar 
 Type exact URL: https://bit.ly/3L8MTI9 
 After this, install the file that you downloaded from the above-mentioned URL 
 You can also follow the below-mentioned pics that help more.

data.name: How to Install Pikahsow app on PC
data.part1: How to Install Pikahsow app on PC (windows and mac)
data.part2:
Download an Android emulator for your system 
 in the market, you will get lost for free android emulators for mac and windows 
 choose any android emulator and install them in your system 
 Now download the pikashow_latest.apk file in your system from tech accents 
 Now open your android emulator and load the pikahsow_latest.apk file 
 Now install this file in your virtual android machine (android emulator) 
 Open the pikashow app in the android emulator and enjoy a Live TV show on your pc.

data.name: How to Watch IPL 2022 in Pikashow App
data.part1: How to Watch IPL 2022 in Pikashow App
data.part2:
You can easily watch IPL 2022 in your Pikashow app by visiting the sports section of this app. in the sports section; you will see a live matches option click on it. After this, you will see all the live matches streams; select the stream you want to watch. 
 If you want to watch Live IPL in pikashow, click on the watch IPL and choose any free server to stream IPL 2022.
